channel.title: Allow Veterans to play with New Player Class Restrictions
channel.description: Further explanation in case the title wasn't clear - We all know that new players are restricted from getting some of the more important roles (King, Prince, MM, and CL). I think it would be nice if there was a toggle button in the options menu that allowed you to turn these restrictions on, even once you are no longer considered a new player. There are times where I really want to play TOL, but don't feel like playing a super important role, so this would definitely get me to play the game more.
